title: [K-12] UDL and CCSS-Integrated Instructional Design: Elementary Social Studies Project-Based Learning Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of elementary education curriculum, understanding of social studies content, and experience with Project-Based Learning (PBL)
context.additional_context: Strengthening project design capabilities for social studies aligned with CCSS (Common Core State Standards) using the UDL (Universal Design for Learning) framework for pre-service elementary teachers.

learning_goals: Development of a Social Studies Project Design Applying the Three UDL Principles (Engagement, Representation, Action/Expression)
Creation of an Assessment Rubric Incorporating CCSS Standards for Reading, Writing, and Critical Thinking
Production and Implementation of Multimodal Representation Materials Using Digital Tools (Padlet, Google Classroom, etc.)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
